name: obsidian-message-journal
description:
Message Journal is an Obsidian plugin that extracts messages related to key contacts from configured QQ and WeChat message bases, summarizes important content using a large language model, and automatically generates daily message summaries and personal diaries.
消息日志是一个 Obsidian 插件，它能从配置的 QQ 和微信消息库中提取与关键联系人相关的消息，利用大型语言模型总结重要内容，并自动生成每日消息摘要和个人日记。

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
